snippet: Prime Minister Tony Abbott asked for a reconsideration of a move to make women who wear full face veils sit in segregated areas of Parliament’s public galleries.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Tony Abbott asked for a reconsideration of a move to make women who wear full face veils sit in segregated areas of Parliament’s public galleries.

headline.main: Australian Premier Urges Review of Seating Rule for Women in Face Veils
headline.print_headline: Australian Premier Urges Review of Seating Rule for Women in Face Veils
